queue.cooldown.zh: §c你刚刚匹配失败，请等待 {seconds} 秒后再尝试加入。
queue.cooldown.en: §cYou recently failed matchmaking. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.

queue.already_in_battle.zh: §c你正在进行战斗，无法加入匹配队列
queue.already_in_battle.en: §cYou are already in a battle and cannot join the queue

queue.join_success_singles.zh: §a已加入 单打 匹配队列...

queue.join_success_doubles.zh: §a已加入 双打 匹配队列...

queue.join_success_unknown.zh: §a已加入 匹配队列（未知模式）...

queue.empty_team.zh: §c你的队伍为空，请先准备至少一只宝可梦再点击加入匹配。
queue.empty_team.en: §cYour team is empty. Please prepare at least one Pokémon before joining matchmaking.

queue.clear.zh: §c服务器关闭，已清除匹配队列

queue.team_load_fail.zh: §c无法加载宝可梦队伍，战斗无法开始
queue.team_load_fail.en: §cFailed to load Pokémon team. Battle cannot start

queue.no_arena.zh: §c没有可用战斗场地（至少2个玩家位置）
queue.no_arena.en: §cNo available battle arenas (at least 2 player positions required)

duo.already_in_queue.en: §eYou are already in the matchmaking queue.

queue.match_success.zh: §e匹配成功！§7将在 §c5秒 §7后开始战斗...

duo.disqualified.zh: §c在战斗中更换了非法队伍，判负处理。

duo.cooldown.zh: §c你刚刚匹配失败，请等待 {seconds} 秒后再加入队列
duo.cooldown.en: §cYou recently failed matchmaking. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.

duo.in_battle.zh: §c你正在进行战斗，无法加入匹配队列
duo.in_battle.en: §cYou are currently in a battle and cannot join the queue.

duo.invalid_team_selection.zh: §c只能选择当前出战队伍（Party）中的宝可梦！
duo.invalid_team_selection.en: §cYou can only select Pokémon from your current party!

duo.invalid_team.zh: §c队伍不符合对战规则，无法加入匹配
duo.invalid_team.en: §cYour team does not meet the battle requirements.

reward.not_eligible.zh: §c胜率未达要求（{rate}%），无法领取 {rank} 段位奖励。
reward.not_eligible.en: §cYou must have at least {rate}% win rate to claim the {rank} reward.

reward.broadcast.zh: §6[Cobblemon Rank] §b{player} §f首次晋升到 §e{rank} §f，已发放奖励！

setSeasonName.error.zh: §c找不到编号为 {seasonId} 的赛季记录。
setSeasonName.error.en: §cCould not find season record with ID {seasonId}.

setSeasonName.success.zh: §a已将第 {seasonId} 赛季名称设置为：§f{name}

season.ended.zh: §a已手动结束当前赛季并开始新赛季
season.ended.en: §aSeason has been manually ended and a new one started

status.none.zh: §7你当前未在任何匹配队列中。
status.none.en: §7You are not in any matchmaking queue.

reward.granted_to.zh: §a已为 {player} 发放 {format}:{rank} 段位奖励

permission.denied.en: §cYou do not have permission to run this command

rank.none.zh: §7该玩家在 {format} 模式下，赛季 #{season} 无排位数据
rank.none.en: §7The player has no ranking data in {format} for season #{season}

leaderboard.more_hint.zh: §e使用 /rank top {format} {season} <页码> [数量] 查看更多

rank.reset.success.zh: §a已清除 {player} 在 {format} 模式下的排位数据。

rank.reset.fail.zh: §c未找到该玩家在 {format} 模式下的排位数据。
rank.reset.fail.en: §cNo ranking data found for the player in {format} mode.

gui.main_title.zh: §6§l▶ Cobblemon Rank 系统 - 主菜单

gui.info_title.zh: §6§l▶ 查看段位 - 选择赛季

gui.queue_title.zh: §6§l▶ 加入匹配 - 请选择模式

gui.reward.top.zh: 直接发放可重复领取的奖励-用于测试
gui.reward.top.en: Directly distribute reusable rewards - for testing purposes

gui.reset.title.zh: §6§l▶ 重置玩家排位数据（第 {page} 页 / 共 {total} 页）

gui.reset.tip.zh: §7点击重置按钮清除指定玩家在该模式的段位数据。
gui.reset.tip.en: §7Click the reset button to clear a player's rank data in that mode.

gui.info_player.title.zh: §6§l▶ 查看段位 - 玩家选择（第 {page} 页 / 共 {total} 页）

battle.team.banned_nature.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦使用了被禁止的性格: {names}
battle.team.banned_nature.en: Your team contains Pokémon with banned natures: {names}

battle.team.banned_gender.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦使用了被禁止的特性: {names}
battle.team.banned_gender.en: Your team contains Pokémon with banned genders: {names}

battle.team.banned_moves.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦使用了被禁止的招式: {names}

battle.team.banned_shiny.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦使用了被禁止的闪光个体: {names}

battle.player.banned_items.zh: §c你的背包中含有被禁止的物品: {items}

battle.disconnect.broadcast.zh: §c玩家 {player} 断线，所在队伍判负。
battle.disconnect.broadcast.en: §cPlayer {player} disconnected and lost. Their team was eliminated.

battle.flee.forbidden.zh: 你不能在排位战中逃跑！
battle.flee.forbidden.en: You cannot flee in a ranked battle.

battle.team.banned_held_items.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦携带了被禁止的物品: {names}
battle.team.banned_held_items.en: Your team contains Pokémon with banned held items: {names}

battle.team.banned_abilities.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦使用了被禁止的特性: {names}
battle.team.banned_abilities.en: Your team contains Pokémon with banned abilities: {names}

battle.team.banned_natures.zh: 队伍中有宝可梦使用了被禁止的性格: {names}

battle.invalid_team_selection.zh: §c只能使用当前出战队伍中的宝可梦！
battle.invalid_team_selection.en: §cYou can only use Pokémon from your current battle team!

battle.flee.loser.zh: §c你在战斗中逃跑，ELO 双倍扣分！当前ELO: §e{elo}
battle.flee.loser.en: §cYou fled from battle. Double ELO penalty! Current ELO: §e{elo}

battle.flee.winner.zh: §a对手逃跑，你的分数未变化。当前ELO: §e{elo}
battle.flee.winner.en: §aOpponent fled. Your ELO remains unchanged. Current ELO: §e{elo}

battle.teleport.back.zh: §a战斗结束，你已被传送回原来的位置。
battle.teleport.back.en: §aBattle ended. You have been teleported back.

duo.rule.zh: §e[提示] 本次为 2v2 轮战模式：每队每次出战一人，胜者留场，败者轮换，直到全员战败！
duo.rule.en: §e[Tip] This is a 2v2 round-robin mode: each team will send one Pokémon per round, and the winner will stay in the battle, while the loser will be replaced. The battle will end when all Pokémon are defeated.

rank.not_found.en: §cYour ranked data could not be found.
